survey data analysis.reasoning: Survey data analysis refers to the method used to collect and analyze data from users of healthcare-based pages on Facebook, providing insights into the factors influencing value co-creation.
passages: Analysis of survey data gathered from users of Top 10 healthcare-based pages on Facebook indicated that both social and technical factors are salient in the prediction of value co-creation in OHCs.

socio-technical theory.reasoning: Socio-technical theory is the theoretical framework applied in the study to identify and analyze the social and technical factors impacting healthcare users' intention to co-create value.
passages: This study relies on the socio-technical theory to identify the social and technical factors that impact healthcare users' intention to co-create value.
